title: Intro (We Got It 4 Cheap, Vol. 1)
lyrics:
[Intro]
Get familiar!
Clinton Sparks!
[Spoken: Pusha-T]
Dope dealers and street niggas alike
This one's for you
The Clipse and Re-Up Records presents…
We Got It 4 Cheap, Volume 1
Introducing “The Re-Up Gang”
Pusha
Ab-Liva
Malice
And last but not least, Sandman
The Black Card Era has begun
*Sniff*
